message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I think it will be very valuable for you, and this is a competitive price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can find it elsewhere within my budget. Would you consider reducing the price to $9,500?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $12,000 is already a very competitive price for what the product offers.  Could you meet me halfway at $10,750?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to meet you at $10,750. Would you consider lowering the price to $10,250?
